sentence.Network_en: He was quiet, conscientious, a bit of a plodder.
sentence.Network_cn: 他做事闷声不响，小心谨慎，有点死气沉沉的。

sentence.Network_en: Virginia was still struggling to be a conscientious and dedicated mother.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗吉尼娅还在尽力成为一位勤勤恳恳、全心奉献的母亲。

sentence.Network_en: The conscientious researcher is careful to avoid up the pole and omission.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位一丝不苟的研究人员总是小心谨慎地避免错误或疏漏.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... confident 有信心的 conscientious 认真的，自觉的 considerate 体贴的.
2013考研英语高频词汇_百度文库 ... confidential 机紧的，秘密的 conscientious 负责的，尽责的 conscious 意识到的，知道的.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... conscience 良心 conscientious 有良心的 conscious 有意识的.
职称英语等级考试A - 原版英语_馆档网 ... conquest 攻取，征服 conscientious 认真的，勤勤恳恳的 consecutive 连续的.

list.abs: 没良心的, 不知廉耻的的英文翻译 ... conscientious 尽责的 conscientious objector 拒服兵役的人 conscientiously 良心上.
...出一些连我自己都会害怕的坏事. ... 如果我拒绝服兵役的良心申请（Conscientious Objector）不被权力机关所批准，我已经准备因此 …
电话留言的格式是什么?写英语作文用的 ... Enthusiasm（ 热诚） Conscientiousness（ 自觉性） standards（ 伦理与道德标准）.
组织行为学中英文词汇对照 - MBA智库百科 ... conformity 从众问题 conscientiousness 责任心 consideration 关怀维度.
conscienceless 没良心的conscientious objaction 良心的抗拒conscientious objector 拒服兵役的人

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French consciencieux, from medieval Latin conscientiosus, from Latin conscientia (see conscience)

entry.def: Someone who is conscientious is very careful to do their work properly.

example.ex: We are generally very conscientious about our work...
example.tran: 我们普遍对工作都非常认真。

example.ex: Virginia was still struggling to be a conscientious and dedicated mother.
example.tran: 弗吉尼娅还在尽力成为一位勤勤恳恳、全心奉献的母亲。

means.word_mean: 1. characterized by extreme care and great effort;

sentences.sentence: "conscientious application to the work at hand"

means.word_mean: 2. guided by or in accordance with conscience or sense of right and wrong;

sentences.sentence: "a conscientious decision to speak out about injustice"

auth_sentence.content: They were not the world's most conscientious janitors.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were not the world's most conscientious janitors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were not the world's most conscientious janitors.

auth_sentence.content: She's very conscientious about her nutrition and rest.
auth_sentence.res_content: She's very conscientious about her nutrition and rest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She's very conscientious about her nutrition and rest.

auth_sentence.content: She praises him for being sane and conscientious.
auth_sentence.res_content: She praises him for being sane and conscientious.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She praises him for being sane and conscientious.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 审慎正直的,认真的,本着良心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sci知道+entious多……的→知道关心的多→有责任,认真的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [of]意识到的,自觉的;神志清醒的

stems_affixes.word_buile: ne不+scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]→adj.无知的;没有知识的
omni到处+scient知道的→adj.无所示在的
pre预先+sci知道+ent……的→预先知道的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有知识的, 有技巧的
stems_affixes.word_buile: sci知道+ent……的→adj.有知识的, 有技巧的
sci知道+ent+ific表形容词→adj.科学上的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+conscious意识到的→adj.不省人事, 未发觉的, 无意识的
sub下面+conscious意识到的→在意识之下→潜意识的
con全部+sci知道+ence表名词→全部知道→良知,良心
pre预先+sci知道+ence表名词→预先知道
scient[adj.有知识的, 有技巧的]+ist专家或人→n.科学家

Sentence.sentence: If you tell an acquaintance you are a grandfather who recently lost his wife and who does volunteer work on weekends, several elements of your self-image are bought to light — the roles of grandparent, widower and conscientious citizen.
